result.html: Ceithre nóiméad chun a deichFour minutes to ten.
result.ponchtml: Ceiṫre nóiméad ċun a deiċFour minutes to ten.

result.html: Chosain sé ceithre euro ormIt cost me four euro.
result.ponchtml: Ċosain sé ceiṫre euro ormIt cost me four euro.

result.eng: I'll see you at four o'clock.
result.ga: Feicfidh mé thú ag a ceathar a chlog
result.orig: Feicfidh mé thú ag a ceathar a chlog
result.html: Feicfidh mé thú ag a ceathar a chlogI'll see you at four o'clock.
result.ponchtml: Feicfiḋ mé ṫú ag a ceaṫar a ċlogI'll see you at four o'clock.

result.ga: Feicfidh mé thú ag a ceathar
result.orig: Feicfidh mé thú ag a ceathar
result.html: Feicfidh mé thú ag a ceatharI'll see you at four.
result.ponchtml: Feicfiḋ mé ṫú ag a ceaṫarI'll see you at four.

result.eng: It will take another four years.
result.html: Glacfaidh sé ceithre bliana eileIt will take another four years.
result.ponchtml: Glacfaiḋ sé ceiṫre bliana eileIt will take another four years.

result.ga: Tógann an turas ceithre huaire an chloig
result.orig: Tógann an turas ceithre huaire an chloig
result.html: Tógann an turas ceithre huaire an chloigThe journey takes four hours.
result.ponchtml: Tógann an turas ceiṫre huaire an ċloigThe journey takes four hours.

result.eng: My classes are [usually] at four o'clock each afternoon.
result.ga: Bíonn mo chuid ranganna ar siúl ag a ceathair a chlog chuile thráthnóna
result.orig: Bíonn mo chuid ranganna ar siúl ag a ceathair a chlog chuile thráthnóna
result.html: Bíonn mo chuid ranganna ar siúl ag a ceathair a chlog chuile thráthnónaMy classes are [usually] at four o'clock each afternoon.
result.ponchtml: Bíonn mo ċuid ranganna ar siúl ag a ceaṫair a ċlog ċuile ṫráṫnónaMy classes are [usually] at four o'clock each afternoon.

result.eng: It is four miles from An Cheathrú Rua to Ros an Mhíl.
result.ga: Tá sé ceithre mhíle ón gCeathrú Rua go Ros an Mhíl
result.orig: Tá sé ceithre mhíle ón gCeathrú Rua go Ros an Mhíl
result.html: Tá sé ceithre mhíle ón gCeathrú Rua go Ros an MhílIt is four miles from An Cheathrú Rua to Ros an Mhíl.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé ceiṫre ṁíle ón gCeaṫrú Rua go Ros an ṀílIt is four miles from An Cheathrú Rua to Ros an Mhíl.

result.eng: It leaves at two o'clock in the afternoon and it will be in New York about a quarter past four, New York time, of course.
result.ga: Imeoidh sé ag a dó a chlog sa tráthnóna agus beidh sé i Nua-Eabhrac thart ar cheathrú tar éis a ceathair am Nua-Eabhrac ar ndóigh
result.orig: Imeoidh sé ag a dó a chlog sa tráthnóna agus beidh sé i Nua-Eabhrac thart ar cheathrú tar éis a ceathair am Nua-Eabhrac ar ndóigh
result.html: Imeoidh sé ag a dó a chlog sa tráthnóna agus beidh sé i Nua-Eabhrac thart ar cheathrú tar éis a ceathair am Nua-Eabhrac ar ndóighIt leaves at two o'clock in the afternoon and it will be in New York about a quarter past four, New York time, of course.
result.ponchtml: Imeoiḋ sé ag a dó a ċlog sa tráṫnóna agus beiḋ sé i Nua-Eaḃrac ṫart ar ċeaṫrú tar éis a ceaṫair am Nua-Eaḃrac ar ndóiġIt leaves at two o'clock in the afternoon and it will be in New York about a quarter past four, New York time, of course.

result.eng: [Looking at a family photo:] Let me see - six boys and four girls. Am I right?
result.ga: Fan go bhfeice mé - seisear buachaillí agus ceathrar cailíní An bhfuil an ceart agam
result.orig: Fan go bhfeice mé - seisear buachaillí agus ceathrar cailíní An bhfuil an ceart agam
result.html: Fan go bhfeice mé - seisear buachaillí agus ceathrar cailíní An bhfuil an ceart agam[Looking at a family photo:] Let me see - six boys and four girls. Am I right?
result.ponchtml: Fan go ḃfeice mé - seisear buaċaillí agus ceaṫrar cailíní An ḃfuil an ceart agam[Looking at a family photo:] Let me see - six boys and four girls. Am I right?

result.eng: I'm married to Cristín and we have four children.
result.ga: Tá mé pósta le Cristín agus tá ceathrar páistí againn
result.orig: Tá mé pósta le Cristín agus tá ceathrar páistí againn
result.html: Tá mé pósta le Cristín agus tá ceathrar páistí againnI'm married to Cristín and we have four children.
result.ponchtml: Tá mé pósta le Cristín agus tá ceaṫrar páistí againnI'm married to Cristín and we have four children.

result.eng: I have four brothers and two sisters myself and I'm the third eldest.
result.ga: Tá ceathrar deartháir agus beirt deirfiúr agam féin agus is mise an tríú duine is sine

result.ponchtml: Tá ceaṫrar dearṫáir agus beirt deirfiúr agam féin agus is mise an tríú duine is sineI have four brothers and two sisters myself and I'm the third eldest.

result.html: Ceithre chéad euro sa mhíFour hundred euro per month.
result.ponchtml: Ceiṫre ċéad euro sa ṁíFour hundred euro per month.

result.eng: Four weeks after the attacks American forces carried out an invasion i to Afghanistan.

result.eng: Jamie was four years old, no more, no less.
